tagline.en: AcroEOS connects EOS to real world
tagline.zh: AcroEOS connects EOS to real world

introduce.en: AcroEOS is based on the capability of financial technology experience. We can support EOS projects establish in proper regulatory manner, utilizing our licenses of financial technology industry and over 5,000 merchant network. By leveraging all of this, we plan to promote and drive widespread usage of EOS among consumers and businesses.
introduce.zh: AcroEOS is based on the capability of financial technology experience.
